title: The Candidate
description: Evelynn swore off men at the early age of seventeen. Finding out the guy you thought you were going to spend forever with was only using you to get close to your high-powered senator dad will do that to a girl.Fast forward ten years, and Evelynn is now following in daddy's footsteps. She's one of the top candidates in the upcoming House seat election. The only problem is the public can be particularly picky about their candidates, and they do not trust someone who is not in a committed relationship. Evelynn's only choice is to have her campaign manager, Molly, find her someone to fake date until the election in six months.Now she just has to juggle that on top of all of the other scandals, attacks, and rumors that exist in the political world. What could go wrong?
author: T.L. Quinn
